about_the_game:
In this heartwarming adventure game, you play as a lonely protagonist who downloads a friendship-making app, only to be transported to a beautiful tropical island. But things take a turn when you discover that others have also been transported there, and they are in danger! To save them, you must navigate through a treacherous cave filled with monsters, befriending them along the way to help you on your quest. With each new friend, you'll discover more about the island's secrets and uncover a mystery that will keep you hooked until the very end. Get ready for a fun and emotional journey filled with friendship, danger, and discovery in this one-of-a-kind game!

Voice acting
Original art
Original soundtrack



Walk around and explore :)

Battle system is more of a friend system!

Controls:
Walk: Arrow keys or WASD or click
Interact: Space, enter or click
Controller: D-PAD to walk and a to interact
